title: senior Head Chef
description: We are seeking a talented Head chef to join our branch in Lekki, Lagos.The ideal candidate will have strong skills in Pastries, local dishes, few foreign dishes, with experience working with the modern cooking methods.

company.name: Morningside resort
company.description: Morningside resort is a leading modern day cooking outlets, that renders lodging services for visitors, specializing in bringing the best delicacies and flavor to our clients, we pride ourselves on the quality of our delivery
